name: Cute Puzzle MAX
description:
Brain training in a little free time!
The basic rule is simple, same as [Minesweeper].
Open the panel and look for 40 bombs.
When the panel opens, sexy images are displayed.
15 pictures are included in this work.
12 pictures are new pictures.
3 pictures are the same pictures as the [Cute Puzzle].
[Cute Puzzle] is distributed free of charge.
Please try before [Cute Puzzle MAX].
https://store.steampowered.com/app/959500/Cute_Puzzle/
You can know the details of the game in more detail.
